title: GLOBALink | Touring sci-tech fair in E China
content:
HEFEI, April 27 (Xinhua) -- The China (Anhui) Science and Technology Innovation Achievement Transformation Fair was held in Hefei, capital of east China's Anhui Province from April 26 to 27 both online and offline.
Many high-tech firms brought their latest inventions to display.
Produced by Xinhua Global Service
